tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the days games in the Football League, including Blackburn Rovers v Millwall, Preston North End v Norwich City, and Watford v Stoke City in the Championship.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Bullseye
programme.desc: Three more teams take on the classic darts-based game show as Queen of the Palace Fallon Sherrock partners with host Freddie Flintoff to try to complete a charity challenge.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Be Your Own Boss
programme.desc: Holly Tucker meets a woman in Nottingham whose premature babywear brand grew from personal trauma, then a husband-and-wife team whose hot sauce honours their St Lucian roots.

programme.title: James Martins Spanish Adventure
programme.desc: James is introduced to carcamusa in Castilla-La Mancha, tries local marzipan, meets an organic honey producer and sees how manchego is made.

programme.title: Fletchers Country Workshop
programme.desc: Liz Fletcher showcases her passion for upcycling and interior design in this festive show.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch grows increasingly annoyed with the ever-growing festive cheer of Whoville.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: Love Your Christmas with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm for this festive foray are the cast of Call the Midwife, Endeavour star Roger Allam, Tom Chambers and Christmas music from Lee Mead.

programme.title: Fletchers Family Farm
programme.desc: Documentary series. The family finally move back onto the farm after months of hard work, and the barn is transformed for a wedding to remember and a heart-warming seasonal close.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Classic fantasy drama film. An angel shows a businessman how life would look without him.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Classic action-adventure film. A band of humans fight for survival in a new theme park.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: The Chase: The Bloopers
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents the 2025 bloopers reel - The Governess, The Sinnerman, The Beast, The Vixen, The Dark Destroyer and The Menace might be clever, but they still make mistakes.

programme.title: The Royal Variety Performance 2025
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the 2025 edition of the event including performances from the musical Les Miserables, the cast of Dead Ringers, and Harry Moulding.

programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.desc: Crime action thriller film sequel. John Wicks fight against the High Table continues.

programme.title: Inside MandS at Christmas
programme.desc: An access-all-areas look inside MandS at Christmas 2025 uncovering secrets behind Colin the Caterpillars makeover, a spicy glazed turkey, and a multi-million-pound shop revamp.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James culinary tour continues in Scotland with a trip to Blair Castle in the Highlands, where hes joined by top Michelin-starred chef Tom Kitchin.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Action-adventure film sequel. A research team try to observe Jurassic Parks dinosaurs.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts a rip-roaring edition of the quiz show featuring national treasure Christopher Biggins, chef extraordinaire Rosemary Shrager, and rugby legend Gareth Chilcott.

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Christmas Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents a festive edition as Kate Silverton, Ruthie Henshall, Iain Sterling and the Reverend Richard Coles hope to win thousands of pounds for charity.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Drama on the Yorkshire Dales with one of Britains longest-running and most beloved soaps.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Debbie is a no-show at her hen party, and Eva confides in Adam her guilt at deceiving Ben.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The first episode in the shows 14th series follows Ros Webb - a mother searching for her only child - and Tegan Cornish, an adopted woman looking for a brother separated from her.

programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.
